scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test yarn w:db run migrations:down:test && yarn w:db run migrations:up:test && cross-env NODE_ENV=test yarn workspace @persona/entities run test
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development yarn w:db run migrations:up:dev && cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "yarn:build:watch" "yarn dev:app" "yarn dev:www" "yarn dev:api"
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production yarn w:db run migrations:up && concurrently "yarn build:app" "yarn build:entities" "yarn build:www" "yarn build:api"
scripts.build:app: cross-env NODE_ENV=production yarn workspace @persona/app run build
scripts.build:api: cross-env NODE_ENV=production yarn workspace @persona/api run compile
scripts.build:entities: cross-env NODE_ENV=production yarn workspace @persona/entities run compile
scripts.build:www: cross-env NODE_ENV=production yarn workspace @persona/www run compile
